capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been looking into the history of Hogwarts and it seems that Filch has a bit of an... complicated relationship with the school. Apparently, he's been the caretaker for years, but his strict adherence to rules can sometimes make him come across as a bit of a stickler for the law. But at the same time, I think there's more to him than just being a grumpy old man. He does seem to have a certain... loyalty to the school, even if he doesn't always show it in the most obvious way.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of hogvy before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-known fact. I'm pretty sure she attended the school there, and it's definitely confirmed by many sources. She's one of the brightest witches of our age, after all!
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what are some of valeria's favorite things to do in her free time?
